package.description: This library implements a pure-pursuit based path following for rovers with Ackermann-type steering. The path is represented as a list of waypoints, each consecutive pair interconnected using a straight line segments. The output is in form of translational and rotational velocity. Inspired by WaypointNavigation by Janosch Machowinski/janosch.machowinski@dfki.de
package.author: Jan Filip/jan.filip@esa.int
